name: Delibird
description: It nests at the edge of sharp cliffs. It spends all day carrying food to its awaiting chicks.

attacks.name: Snowy Present
attacks.effect: Draw a card for each Water Energy attached to all of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Hail
attacks.effect: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
